document.docAuthor: Romero-Ortiz, Catalina, García, Fabian & Villarreal, Eduardo
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the false scorpions (Arachnida: Pseudoscorpiones) of Colombia, with new records and a key to the identification of the families

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the false scorpions (Arachnida: Pseudoscorpiones) of Colombia, with new records and a key to the identification of the families

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution : Argentina , Brazil , Colombia , Costa Rica , Ecuador , Guatemala , Guyana , Haiti , Mexico , Panama , Paraguay , Peru , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines and Venezuela .
